CustomField.description: For Conso to call the Document webservice, the transaction id must match to the transaction id from Conso. As TECH_TransactionId__c is maybe used by another call, this field is created.
CustomField.formula: IF ( AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(TransactionStoreType__c, 'Web'), ISPICKVAL(TransactionStoreType__c, 'CSC') ), NOT(ISBLANK(OrderATGId__c)) ), OrderATGId__c, TransactionRMSId__c )
CustomField.label: TECH_TransactionIdConso
